turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Workplace bullying.
turn.1: What are the main types of workplace bullying?
turn.2: Bullying behaviours by supervisors may be associated with a culture of bullying and the management style of the supervisors.
turn.4: An authoritative management style, specifically, often includes bullying behaviours, which can make subordinates fearful and allow supervisors to bolster their authority over others.
turn.5: Is there anything else significant about workplace bullying?
turn.6: On the other hand, some researchers suggest that bullying behaviours can be a positive force for performance in the workplace.
turn.7: What are some examples of the positive force?
turn.8: Workplace bullying may contribute to organizational power and control.
turn.9: Is there anything else that is notable?
turn.10: However, if an organization wishes to discourage bullying in the workplace, strategies and policies must be put into place to dissuade and counter bullying behavior.
turn.11: What are some examples of the strategies and policies?
turn.12: Lack of monitoring or of punishment/corrective action will result in an organizational culture that supports/tolerates bullying.
